title: Amanda Holden shares Lisa Faulkner wedding pic and was 'thrilled to be part of it'

Amanda Holden has thanked newlyweds Lisa Faulkner and John Torode for her wedding invite in a sweet social media post.

The Heart Breakfast presenter, 48, branded the pair as "family" in her recent snap uploaded to Instagram .

Amanda, who attended the ceremony with hubby Chris Hughes, posted the heartfelt black and white snap on Saturday night, following Lisa and John's lavish wedding surrounded by family and friends on Thursday.

The post was captioned: "A wonderful day filled with love and so much laughing. Chris and I thrilled to be part of it. ♥️ #wedding #family".

Pictured in the snap was Lisa - clad in a fitted white gown and lace body with half of her long hair pinned back out of her face - beside John, who wore a smart black suit and tie while grinning proudly beside his new wife.

John himself thanked Amanda back, saying: "Thanks you. Loved our dance," with a heart emoji.

Other fans congratulated the happy couple on their nuptial.

Amanda turned up to Lisa's special day on crutches, after breaking her leg in two places following an accident on holiday.

She attempted to complete a Total Wipeout-style inflatable assault course when she suffered the dramatic accident.

(Image: Instagram)

(Image: Instagram)

But she still made it to the pair's special day which was held at Aynhoe Park in Banbury, Oxfordshire in front of family and friends.

They had a spectacular marbled wedding cake and a star studded wedding list, who watched the couple exchange their vows at the glamorous setting.

(Image: Instagram)

(Image: restorationcake/Instagram)

(Image: aynhoepark/Instagram)

Aynhoe Park, a Grade I listed 17th-century country house rebuilt after the English Civil War, offers a bespoke wedding service which can be a "classical fairy tale or a story of rock n roll decadence - or a bit of both."

The house also boasts a team of excellent chefs who can rustle up a bespoke menu for the lucky couple.
description: The gorgeous post was a special thanks to the couple for inviting Amanda to their star-studded wedding
